abstract: Detroit automakers’ share of the American car market fell to a record low in June, foreshadowing another summer of deep discounts, cheap car loans and deals on leases.
snippet: Detroit automakers’ share of the American car market fell to a record low in June, foreshadowing another summer of deep discounts, cheap car loans and deals on leases.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, July 3 — The Detroit automakers’ share of the American car market fell to a record low in June, statistics showed Tuesday, foreshadowing another summer of deep discounts, cheap car loans and deals on leases.

headline.main: Detroit’s Big 3 Lost Buyers Last Month
headline.print_headline: Detroit’s Big 3 Lost Buyers Last Month
